MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the ML9 postcode area of Larkhall. It was necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 12.20PM due to emergency repairs required to damaged equipment on Hamilton Street. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 5.30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 11.55AM on 28 November 2020.
